#summary Keyboard

== view mode ==

|| *~* || normal view mode ||
|| *1* || view channel 1 ||
|| *2* || view channel 2 ||
|| *3* || view channel 3 ||
|| *4* || view channel 4 ||
|| *F* || "full" view (hide panels) ||

== histogram ==

|| *F1* || histogram channel 1 ||
|| *F2* || histogram channel 2 ||
|| *F3* || histogram channel 3 ||
|| *F4* || histogram channel 4 ||

== layers ==
|| *B* || add blur layer ||
|| *C* || add curves layer ||
|| *M* || add mixer layer ||

== curves editor ==

|| *CTRL* || add control points on curves ||
|| *X* || delete last selected curve point ||
|| *A* || move last selected curve point up ||
|| *Z* || move last selected curve point down ||
|| *R* || realtime switch (not persistent) ||

== other ==

|| *S* || dump sampler color on console ||
